official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management.

summary.text: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management.

titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management.
